resources.string:
We, the Watchapp team, decided
 		to create an app that will 
 		help you keep track the series, 
 		movies, or any kind of videos
 		you've watched
\t\t\tClick on the add category button\n \t\t\tand type the desired name of the category\n \t\t\tNOTE: Categories should be unique!
\t\t\tClick a category and type the name\n \t\t\tof the video to be added\n \t\t\tNOTE: Videos should be unique!
\t\t\tClick on the edit button on the video\n \t\t\tyou want add a note and type\n \t\t\tyour desired text
